jobInfo.Jobdescription:
Senior QA


Requirements:

  • 5+ years of experience working in Big Data testing / ETL testing / QuerySurge.
  • Experience any reporting tools like Tableau/Power BI or any BI tools.
  • Experience in any programming like Java / Scala / Python
  • Experience working in agile scrum teams and productivity tools like Jira and Confluence.
  • Good understanding of current and best QA Big Data practices, methodologies and techniques, with practical experience in the implementation.
jobInfo.Specialization:
·      Must have atleast 3+ years in Bigdata testing / ETL testing / complex SQL testing 

·      Must have testing experience in any BI / reporting tools like tableau / PowerBI.

·      Must have experience in any programming skills – Java / Scala / Python
